exsum.creativeTechnologist: Senior technologist who delivers complex technology initiatives. Translates vague ideas into scalable, production-grade platforms.
exsum.engagement: Proven at 0→1, 1→N, and scale-up inflection points. Recently built a system that transforms 100+ hours of audio into structured inference every minute.
exsum.managementResource: Brought in to de-risk execution, accelerate delivery, and scale teams and systems. Advisor to founders, C-level, and VPs.
exsum.practicalExperienceOnAllLayers: Founder-level generalist: backend, web, mobile, desktop, data, ML, QA, platform, infrastructure, and DevOps. Dabbles in product, design, and UX. Loves building.
exsum.problemSolver: Your solution to: "How do we build this?"

tartarus.description: From-the-ground-up deep learning framework for TypeScript.
tartarus.name: Tartarus Deep Learning Framework

abridge.details: Joined Abridge at ~30 employees. Company's first senior staff engineer. Operated through hyper-growth and multiple funding stages (A16Z, Khosla Ventures, Elad Gil, IVP). Drove core technical direction by leading architecture decisions and selecting foundational technologies (e.g., Temporal) that scaled with the business. Proposed, architected, and implemented mission-critical systems, including large-scale orchestration of audio into structured clinical notes. Led high-risk, high-precision internal initiatives such as major database migrations, owning design, execution, and reliability outcomes end to end.
abridge.summary: Healthcare AI startup | 300 employees | $700M series C-E
abridge.title: Senior Staff Software Engineer

arena.details: Owned engineering, architecture, and IT. Scaled the platform through Series A led by CRV, Craft Ventures, Artisanal Ventures, and Vela Partners. Cut technical operations costs 40%+. Led company-wide migration from JavaScript to TypeScript. Established disciplined engineering practices: code reviews, CI, planning, metrics-driven operations, and standardized technical processes.
arena.summary: Audience engagement startup | 50 employees | $13.6M series A
arena.title: Chief Technology Officer

hpi.details: Led end-to-end product development and delivery for new consumer products, from concept through launch. UK market leader in vehicle history checks.
hpi.summary: Private company | Automotive data & asset protection | £20M revenue
hpi.title: Head of Technology

madbid.details: Co-founded MadBid and led all technology and software development from bootstrap to scale. Built and ran the entire engineering organization through rapid growth.
madbid.summary: Entertainment shopping startup | 75 employees | £4M Series A | £10M revenue
madbid.title: Technical Director

optym.details: Supported Optym’s SaaS technology ventures. Established shared architectures, policies, and delivery standards to enable rapid product launches. Mentored senior engineers and technical leaders, reinforcing execution quality and engineering culture. Worked directly with customers, partners, and executives to design new products, deliver bespoke solutions.
optym.summary: B2B SaaS | Optimization & Decision Science | 250 employees | $25M revenue
optym.title: Chief Technology Officer

solera.details: Led strategic R&D and product incubation initiatives for the office of the CEO. Assessed emerging technologies for enterprise adoption, including ML, blockchain, AR/VR, IoT/telematics, digital identity, large-scale data platforms, and cloud-native SaaS (AWS).
solera.summary: Multinational | Risk management & asset protection | 6,000 employees | $1.1B revenue
solera.title: Chief Architect

talmix.details: Rebuilt a legacy platform into a scalable two-sided marketplace. Led search and matching improvements to increase relevance of consultant recommendations.
talmix.summary: Management consulting startup | Talent search | £2M series A
talmix.title: Chief Technology Officer
